entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as a guide who leads the group to the edge of the Forbidden Forest. He is described as holding a lamp and pointing down a narrow path into the forest.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as being unable to keep fear out of his voice when discussing the possibility of encountering whatever hurt the unicorn.

entities.name: unicorn
entities.description: The unicorn is described as being badly hurt and having its blood shine on the ground. It is also mentioned that Hagrid found a dead unicorn last Wednesday.

entities.name: fear
entities.description: Fear is mentioned as an emotion felt by Malfoy when discussing the possibility of encountering whatever hurt the unicorn.

entities.name: forbidden forest
entities.description: The Forbidden Forest is introduced as a location where Hagrid leads the group and where they will try to find the injured unicorn.

relationships.description: Hagrid is trying to help the injured unicorn by finding it and possibly putting it out of its misery.
Malfoy is experiencing fear when discussing the possibility of encountering whatever hurt the unicorn.
